 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַם‎</span>] **verb** ==tear, rend garment== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***chop up*** onions, etc. ([[BDB#Landberg|Landberg]]<sup>Prov.421</sup>); Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cut, rend***); — always with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׃בְּגָדִים‎</span> **Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְרֹם‎</span> [[Lev.21.10|Lev 21:10]] ([[BDB#H|H]]), 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְרֹ֑מוּ‎</span> [[Lev.10.6|Lev 10:6]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); ***Passive participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּרֻמִים‎</span> [[Lev.13.45|Lev 13:45]] ([[BDB#P|P]]).
